Package me.agno.gridjavacore.sorting

Class QueryStringSortSettings

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.sorting.QueryStringSortSettings
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGridSortSettings
public class QueryStringSortSettings extends Object implements IGridSortSettings
The QueryStringSortSettings class represents the settings for sorting a grid using query string parameters. It implements the IGridSortSettings interface.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    DEFAULT_COLUMN_QUERY_PARAMETER
    The DEFAULT_COLUMN_QUERY_PARAMETER constant represents the default query parameter for sorting a grid by column.
    static final String
    DEFAULT_DIRECTION_QUERY_PARAMETER
    Represents the default direction query parameter for sorting a grid.

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT_DIRECTION_QUERY_PARAMETER

      public static final String DEFAULT_DIRECTION_QUERY_PARAMETER
      Represents the default direction query parameter for sorting a grid. This variable is used in the QueryStringSortSettings class.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_COLUMN_QUERY_PARAMETER

      public static final String DEFAULT_COLUMN_QUERY_PARAMETER
      The DEFAULT_COLUMN_QUERY_PARAMETER constant represents the default query parameter for sorting a grid by column. The value of this constant is "grid-column".
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • QueryStringSortSettings

      public QueryStringSortSettings(LinkedHashMap<String,List<String>> query)
      Represents the sorting settings for a query string. The sorting settings include the column and direction query parameter names, as well as the sort values.

  • Method Details

    • setColumnQueryParameterName

      public void setColumnQueryParameterName(String value)
      Sets the name of the column query parameter.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to set the column query parameter name to

    • setDirectionQueryParameterName

      public void setDirectionQueryParameterName(String value)
      Sets the name of the direction query parameter.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to set the direction query parameter name (must not be null)
